statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + x - 6 , -6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 12 , 18 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 36 , -3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 3 , -3 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
